S

showCoursesByCategory(String, String, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.CourseController
this function shows the courses by category, every category has courses so it shows the courses of the chosen category by a user (teacher or student), it also shows all the courses if the user choose "All Categories" option
ShowMyCourses(String, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.CourseController
this function returns HTML page of the courses of a specific teacher that is created by him
sign_in(User, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.UserController
this function takes the user-name and password from a user to open his account on the web-site
sign_up(Student, BindingResult, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.StudentController
this function takes the data from the student and creates an account for him
sign_up(Teacher, BindingResult, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.TeacherController
this function takes the data from the teacher and creates an account for him
StudentController - Class in com.se_project.controllers
This class implements the controller functions that link between the student model and its views.
StudentController() - Constructor for class com.se_project.controllers.StudentController
 
submitAnswers(Answers, Model, String, long, String) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.GameController
this function takes the user answers for a game questions and checks if it is right or wrong
